name: Thomas Mai
body:
### About Me
Hey, I'm Thomas Mai. I am currently an undergraduate business student on a pursuit in a career in the business and technology sectors. I am currently attending [Ryerson University](http://www.ryerson.ca/) in Toronto, Canada since September 2016 for the Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) in Business Technology Management program offered by the [Ted Rogers School of Management](http://www.ryerson.ca/tedrogersschool/).

### Contact
Feel free to contact me at thomas.mai[at]thomasmai.me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
